channel.title: [Vyrescape] Back online || Double experience to celebrate
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://vyrescape.com/landing/images/logo.png[/img] ----------------------------- [i][b]Important links:[/b][/i] ----------------------------- [url=http://vyrescape.com][img]http://vyrescape.com/files/images/PlayNow.png[/img][b] Press here to Play Now![/b][/url] -----------------------------
[b]Hello and Welcome to our advertisement page![/b]
To begin, our servers have been online since 2012 under the name "VyreScape". Vyrescape was introduced in mid April, 2012. Since then we've had our ups and downs, but now, we're back stronger than ever!
----------------------------- You can review the update logs here: http://vyrescape.com/forum/index.php?/forum/21-updates/ -----------------------------
[youtube]https://youtu.be/eHi--HSax0E[/youtube]
[b]More player-made Youtube videos can be seen here:[/b] [url=https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=vyrescape]https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=vyrescape[/url] ----------------------------- [img]http://i.imgur.com/nbRhBOW.jpg[/img] ----------------------------- [img]http://i.imgur.com/pbrrd2Z.png[/img] ----------------------------- [img]http://i.imgur.com/ip7JMVI.png[/img] ----------------------------- [img]http://i.imgur.com/qJaaKxU.png[/img] ----------------------------- [img]http://i.imgur.com/LR2eK1W.png[/img] ----------------------------- [img]http://i.imgur.com/APzEsqP.png[/img] ----------------------------- [img]http://i.imgur.com/97DJHxN.png[/img] ----------------------------- [img]http://i.imgur.com/fTYOTGq.png[/img] ----------------------------- [img]http://i.imgur.com/3rOf774.png[/img] -----------------------------

item.title: [Vyrescape] Back online || Double experience to celebrate
item.dc:creator: @VyrescapeIV VyrescapeIV
item.description:
@VyrescapeIV wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:2, topic:551542”]I’ll start out with that homepage. I have to ask, what’s the point in having that green-like baner but a oldschool like color for the rest of it along with a black background? It doesn’t matter whatsoever on that part.

Going onto the forums, there seems to be quite the amount of color going on around there, which is good in some cases and this being one of them. However, those crowns being used are looking absolutely weird and not sure how I feel about all that - wow. Not to mention the colors and its effect attempted are making them look a tad bad. Some of these crowns look like they have a blur effect, why? It makes no sense and looks not so good.

Either than that, I’ve seen this server been up and down for a while now and it seems to keep coming back so I wish for the best of luck this time around and hope it does well. Good luck![/quote]
Thanks for the feedback! I’ve made some changes around the forums, regarding member groups and trying to balance out the colors, have a look now, if you’re interested :).
Thanks! Will be trying to get back into the top spots.

EDIT:
Events done yesterday:
http://www.vyrescape.com/forum/index.php?/topic/2566-community-event-prizes-skill-node/

Pics:

Read full topic
item.source: [Vyrescape] Back online || Double experience to celebrate

item.title: [Vyrescape] Back online || Double experience to celebrate
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I remember this when this first came out, I never thought it would become such a serious thing but it’s not really a bad thing. Anyway, from the media, there seems to be some things that would attract someone or at least give it a try.

I’ll start out with that homepage. I have to ask, what’s the point in having that green-like baner but a oldschool like color for the rest of it along with a black background? It doesn’t matter whatsoever on that part.

Going onto the forums, there seems to be quite the amount of color going on around there, which is good in some cases and this being one of them. However, those crowns being used are looking absolutely weird and not sure how I feel about all that - wow. Not to mention the colors and its effect attempted are making them look a tad bad. Some of these crowns look like they have a blur effect, why? It makes no sense and looks not so good.

Either than that, I’ve seen this server been up and down for a while now and it seems to keep coming back so I wish for the best of luck this time around and hope it does well. Good luck!

Read full topic
item.source: [Vyrescape] Back online || Double experience to celebrate
